channel.title: Moderators
channel.description:
I see that the moderators do a good job over this side of the community. Although, looking on moparscape side, there is not much moderating going on, for instance
http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,350284.msg2691623.html
The time that was posted was
[b]« on: Today at 05:19:36 am »[/b]
it is now
[b]10:43:23 am »[/b] Forum time, this topic has been around for 5 hours, and no activity has been done. I remember before when there was high moderation on the moparscape forums, where has this gone?

item.title: Moderators
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“Greeny, post:41, topic:265369”][quote author=Efilite link=topic=350335.msg2697356#msg2697356 date=1236376511]
Highly doubt that is allowed.
Being racist in a post is against the rules, so it is for signatures.
It can still offend people.
[/quote]

It’s not against the rules.[/quote]

Racism is against the rules, but I won't be putting up with arguments such as "he said nigger, that's racist" or "that isn't politically correct".
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,298518.msg2398433.html#msg2398433

Read full topic

item.title: Moderators
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

[quote=“Efilite, post:36, topic:265369”]Highly doubt that is allowed.
Being racist in a post is against the rules, so it is for signatures.
It can still offend people.[/quote]

It’s not against the rules.

Read full topic

item.title: Moderators
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Im on a GMT times

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:38, topic:265369”][quote author=Efilite link=topic=350335.msg2697356#msg2697356 date=1236376511]
Highly doubt that is allowed.
Being racist in a post is against the rules, so it is for signatures.
It can still offend people.
[/quote]
Grow up, it’s the internet.[/quote]

I know a couple of places you can go were you can be a racist as you wish ie. Texas, Alabama, Poland, Northern Ireland, Greece ect.

Read full topic

item.title: Moderators
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Efilite:

It can still offend people.

Very true, however, unless people do complain about it(and I’ve said this before, genuinely complain and not “that’s offensive to people, remove it now”) we will remove it.

Read full topic

item.title: Moderators
item.dc:creator: @BAsh BAsh
item.description:
@BAsh wrote:

Oh btw you can’t nigger force. While it is possible, it is obvious that you have failed to make the two lines line up.

Read full topic

item.title: Moderators
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“error.login, post:34, topic:265369”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=350335.msg2696973#msg2696973 date=1236357607]

That probably wouldn’t have been taken care of that soon even if it was on moparisthebest.com because it is so early in the morning practically no one is on. As Greeny said, simply report the post and it will be taken care of when the next staff member that comes on reads the report.

othx for not including me
What times are you looking for in GMT (+1)? I mean, there are enough English/Dutch folks around here. Even some from Scandinavia. I guess someone like bowserjr/lordbost/OnlyOneRule could do some moderating.

(I mean someone like them, not them in particular. They are quite active, quite trustworthy, and medium/longtime members).
[/quote][/quote]

I don’t think having ‘NIGGER FORCE’ as a signature will help your chances much anyway…

Read full topic

(I mean someone like them, not them in particular. They are quite active, quite trustworthy, and medium/longtime members).[/quote]

item.title: Moderators
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Moparisthebest:

That probably wouldn’t have been taken care of that soon even if it was on moparisthebest.com because it is so early in the morning practically no one is on. As Greeny said, simply report the post and it will be taken care of when the next staff member that comes on reads the report.

What times are you looking for in GMT (+1)? I mean, there are enough English/Dutch folks around here. Even some from Scandinavia. I guess someone like bowserjr/lordbost/OnlyOneRule could do some moderating.

(I mean someone like them, not them in particular. They are quite active, quite trustworthy, and medium/longtime members).

item.title: Moderators
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:23, topic:265369”][quote author=BAsh link=topic=350335.msg2695127#msg2695127 date=1236207088]

What’s moparscape?

e-penis size=size-of-clien.java/posts

Wrong.
e-penis size=size-of-clien.javaposts
is more accurate.
[/quote]
To further refine the formula:
e-penis size = (size-of-clien.javaposts) / rep + int crew so far[/quote]

e-penis= (client.java*posts) / rep

Is better, where client.java is in bytes

Read full topic

item.title: Moderators
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote=“aids carrier, post:1, topic:265907”][quote author=Greeny link=topic=350335.msg2691689#msg2691689 date=1236014192]

I remember before when there was high moderation on the moparscape forums, where has this gone?

LOL, no.
[/quote]It used to be moderated heavily, but that mod was banned.[/quote]
Moderated heavily? Probably, Moderated well? Certainly not.

Read full topic

item.title: Moderators
item.dc:creator: @Efilite Efilite
item.description:
@Efilite wrote:

Moparisthebest:

That probably wouldn’t have been taken care of that soon even if it was on moparisthebest.com because it is so early in the morning practically no one is on. As Greeny said, simply report the post and it will be taken care of when the next staff member that comes on reads the report.

That’s what I’m trying to say, most of the moderators are from a different time zone.
It’s like if moparscapians wait for you all to go to sleep, then attack.
Maybe look for a staff member that is from a different time zone, active, helpful, and worthy of a moderator position.

Read full topic

item.title: Moderators
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:25, topic:265369”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=350335.msg2695711#msg2695711 date=1236259887]

It technically is part of this site whether you like to think it that way or not. They share the same members, and posts, if you search for something it gives results from both sides, for the longest time deleted topics both went this side if I am not mistaken.

seriously sdfu, how you even figured out how to register is a mystery to me do us all a favour and wander back over to your home over at moparscape, where the intelligent are often rejected. I’d imagine you’ll fit right in.
[/quote]

you can’t take m.dog seriously…

[quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=351017.msg2695697#msg2695697 date=1236255941]
No. Conor is a massive idiot in my opinion. He also has a tenancy to “leak things” quite easily. Giving him access to the vet sections is one of the stupidest things you could do.
[/quote][/quote]
i have to drop my at least 100 IQ just to understand what he’s saying…

Read full topic
